rebin03/CollabX.summary: Recent activities involve updates to the dashboard for brand, addition of data models for payment transaction, proposals, and ratings. Views and templates have been added for brand dashboard, creator list, and campaign listing. The repository has seen implementation of custom authentication backend, and updates to the creator profile and campaign forms. Significant work on templates for campaign forms, creator signup, and brand dashboard has also been done.

rebin03/expense-manager.summary: Recent updates include the implementation of token authentication for the expense manager API. The API now supports creating, listing, updating, viewing, and deleting expenses. These changes indicate significant progress in the development of the expense manager's functionality.

profile_summary:
Muhammed Rebin is a highly skilled software developer with a strong foundation in programming languages such as Python, C++, and JavaScript. As a Python Django full stack developer, he has developed a unique expertise in designing and implementing scalable, efficient, and reliable software solutions. With a growing professional network of 17 followers, Muhammed Rebin has established himself as a trusted and influential figure in the development community. His impressive portfolio of 21 public repositories showcases his dedication to active development and commitment to delivering high-quality results.

As a seasoned software developer, Muhammed Rebin brings a wealth of technical expertise and innovative thinking to the table. With a proven track record of success, he is well-equipped to handle complex development projects and deliver tailored solutions that meet the needs of clients. By leveraging his technical skills and industry knowledge, Muhammed Rebin is able to drive digital transformation and create value for organizations. With his strong work ethic, attention to detail, and passion for software development, Muhammed Rebin is a reliable and results-driven professional who consistently delivers exceptional results, making him an asset to any development team or project.
